imag_gen1.v1: Cinematic wide shot of a professional roofing crew silhouetted against a glowing golden-hour sky, perched along the ridgeline of a charming suburban home; ladders lean against the eaves, harness tethers arc gracefully, and warm sunlight reveals the crisp texture of fresh shingles; hyper-detailed, color-graded, 16:9 panoramic composition
imag_gen1.v2: Sunrise bathes a quiet neighborhood street as roofers ascend sturdy aluminum ladders, tool belts and nail guns catching the first orange light; the home’s gables create elegant geometry while wisps of mist lift from the lawns; rich contrast, storybook suburban setting, ultra-sharp, 16:9
imag_gen1.v3: High vantage editorial image of a coordinated roofing team working across a steep-pitched roof, safety lines taut, chalk guidelines precise; the sky is crystal blue, the shingle pattern meticulously aligned, and a subtle breeze ruffles a branded cap; immersive clarity, professional tone, 16:9
imag_gen1.v4: Low-angle dynamic frame of two roofers laying ridge caps in perfect sequence, each shingle edge catching the sun like facets; the camera glides along the crest, highlighting sure hands, clean lines, and immaculate craftsmanship; razor-sharp textures, cinematic depth, 16:9
imag_gen1.v5: Warm evening tableau of a driveway with a branded pickup, stacked shingle bundles, and a tidy jobsite; up on the roof, the crew works in rhythm as golden light paints long shadows over the gables; photojournalistic realism, inviting and trustworthy, 16:9

imag_gen2.v1: Elegant abstract gradient background that murmurs with faint, layered roofline silhouettes—barely-there shapes that suggest structure without distraction; soft vignette edges and a calm color drift designed to cradle bold headline text, 16:9
imag_gen2.v2: Minimal graphite-to-slate gradient with feathery roof iconography ghosted beneath the surface; generous negative space invites typography, while the backdrop remains dignified and modern, 16:9
imag_gen2.v3: Slate-blue wash with a whisper of shingle lattice woven into the gradient; the texture reads as atmosphere rather than pattern, maintaining a tranquil field for UI elements, 16:9
imag_gen2.v4: Golden-amber to sand gradient that carries a gentle diagonal roofline motif; the contrast is intentionally restrained, letting buttons and titles float effortlessly, 16:9
imag_gen2.v5: Cool dove-grey gradient with a powdery noise patina and the softest hint of roof geometry; editorial polish, timeless neutrality, and wide usability, 16:9

Content.bus_description:
Cowboys-Vaqueros Construction has been a trusted name in the roofing industry for 11 years, delivering exceptional craftsmanship and reliability. Specializing in residential and commercial roofing, we combine time-tested techniques with modern materials to ensure durability, aesthetic appeal, and long-lasting protection for your property.

At Cowboys-Vaqueros Construction, we pride ourselves on personalized service and unwavering integrity. Our skilled team handles every project with meticulous attention to detail, from initial inspection to final installation. Customer satisfaction is our top priority, and we stand behind our work with industry-leading warranties and transparent communication.

cards.title: Expert Craftsmanship
cards.desc: Our seasoned professionals bring 11+ years of expertise, ensuring precision and quality in every roof we install or repair.

cards.title: Trusted Warranties
cards.desc: We offer robust warranties on materials and labor, giving you peace of mind for years to come.

cards.title: Personalized Service
cards.desc: From consultation to completion, we tailor solutions to fit your needs, budget, and timeline.

cards.title: BBB Accredited
cards.desc: Recognized for integrity, transparency and commitment to customer satisfaction by the Better Business Bureau.

imag_gen1.v1: Ultra-detailed close-up of cedar shake roofing where each fiber of the grain is visible; soft, even daylight caresses the staggered edges, revealing the natural rhythm of the overlapping shakes; rich, tactile realism invites the viewer to feel the wood
imag_gen1.v2: Macro frame that skims along the serrated edge of a cedar shake—minute splinters, delicate knots, and the warm tawny palette rendered in buttery raking light that sculpts micro-shadows across the surface
imag_gen1.v3: Diagonal composition emphasizing the cascading overlap of cedar shakes; razor-sharp texture transitions into a creamy falloff, while subtle variances of amber and chestnut tones suggest craftsmanship and durability
imag_gen1.v4: Weathered shakes with a story: gentle greys and muted siennas braided into the grain; shallow depth of field isolates a single edge while soft bokeh echoes the repeating pattern beyond
imag_gen1.v5: Newly installed cedar shakes with immaculate cuts, crisp edges, and delicate saw marks; shadows step across the surface in neat intervals, conveying precision and artisanal pride

imag_gen2.v1: Action-forward view of a roofing crew installing asphalt shingles on a bright, wind-brushed day; the chalk line glows electric blue against the matte shingles as nail guns snap with crisp precision
imag_gen2.v2: Close perspective on a roofer’s gloved hands steadying a shingle while a pneumatic nail gun bites down; sunlight glints off the metal nose, and tiny nail coils shimmer in the periphery
imag_gen2.v3: Two-person choreography along a pitched roof—one aligning shingles along the chalk guideline, the other fastening in a practiced rhythm; safety harnesses taut, focus unwavering
imag_gen2.v4: Methodical placement of a starter strip at the eave: tool belt bristling with essentials, measuring tape extended, the first course perfectly square to the fascia
imag_gen2.v5: Process portrait of underlayment rolled smooth and drip edge seated cleanly; a soft breeze lifts a corner before it’s secured, hinting at motion in an otherwise meticulous scene

imag_gen3.v1: A dreamy aerial sweep over a suburban tapestry at sunset; rooftops glow like embers while long shadows stitch the streets into a quilt of geometry and light, 16:9
imag_gen3.v2: Drone view drifting over varied roof materials—slate greys, earthy browns, and metallic sheens—bathed in syrupy golden light that kisses every ridge and valley
imag_gen3.v3: Bird’s-eye on a cul-de-sac where the patterned shingles form hypnotic loops; dusk air turns lavender as trees cradle the roofs in velvety silhouettes
imag_gen3.v4: High-angle panorama with the canopy rippling like a green sea around immaculate rooftops; evening glow settles calmly, revealing the order and craft of each installation
imag_gen3.v5: Overhead mosaic of neighborhoods with dancing roof pitches and chimneys; twilight warms the scene into a serene, rhythmic grid

imag_gen4.v1: Meticulous flat lay on honey-toned decking: a well-worn hammer, spiral nails catching the light, and a beloved utility knife; shallow depth of field turns the composition into an artisan’s still life
imag_gen4.v2: Plywood canvas with tools aligned like instruments in an orchestra—measuring tape curled in a perfect arc, chalk line poised to draw truth across the grain
imag_gen4.v3: Neatly arrayed ridge vent, shingle stack, and a nail gun with coiled ammunition; workshop lighting paints soft highlights across metal and matte surfaces
imag_gen4.v4: Symmetric top-down arrangement of a roofing square, pry bar, and fasteners—an ode to precision with visual balance and satisfying order
imag_gen4.v5: Close detail where coil nails glimmer beside a razor-edged roofing knife; selective focus sculpts a quiet drama around everyday tools

imag_gen5.v1: Modern eave study in soft light: fascia board runs like a crisp underline while a seamless gutter echoes its path; the junctions feel engineered and elegant
imag_gen5.v2: Close-up portrait of an aluminum gutter with a seamless downspout—clean miters, tight joints, and straight, architectural lines that whisper durability
imag_gen5.v3: The meeting of soffit and fascia rendered as minimalist sculpture; vents perforate the soffit in measured cadence, the finish impeccable and quietly luxurious
imag_gen5.v4: Macro angle on a gutter guard seated with confidence atop the eave; tight framing celebrates the functionality hidden in the details
imag_gen5.v5: Editorial-style shot of a black fascia tracing bold contrast against pale siding; the gutter profile cuts a decisive silhouette in the frame

imag_gen6.v1: At dusk, a commercial flat roof stretches toward a city skyline twinkling awake; HVAC units stand like sentinels on a reflective membrane, the sky a cobalt-to-rose gradient
imag_gen6.v2: Blue-hour serenity over an expansive TPO roof whose surface mirrors the last light; rooftop equipment forms a quiet procession against the soft horizon
imag_gen6.v3: A warehouse crown defined by parapets, vents, and rubber walkway pads; the urban backdrop hints at industry and continuity beyond the edge
imag_gen6.v4: Dramatic evening sky pours color over skylights and mechanical stacks, carving crisp silhouettes into the roofline; the scene breathes capability and scale
imag_gen6.v5: Low, cinematic sweep across a commercial roof membrane toward distant city lights; the leading lines invite the eye into a story of modern infrastructure

imag_gen1.v1: A polished before/after presentation template that frames the same home from the same camera position—left shows the weary, weather-stained roof; right unveils the immaculate replacement; neutral borders and quiet typography keep the focus on transformation
imag_gen1.v2: Side-by-side roof comparison with perfectly aligned perspective and horizon; the before image retains its tired patina while the after gleams with crisp edges; a subtle divider line suggests a narrative of renewal
imag_gen1.v3: Interactive split-slider concept imagined as still art: the dividing line glides between the old and new roof, both shot identically; the composition reads as a single scene revealing two timeframes
imag_gen1.v4: Twin photographs anchored by matching verticals and roof pitches; the left whispers of age—curling shingles, uneven tones—while the right sings with fresh uniformity and restored geometry
imag_gen1.v5: Meticulously matched pre- and post-renovation images where only the roof changes; the constant camera angle and light tell a clear, compelling story of craft

imag_gen2.v1: A pristine asphalt shingle roof shimmering under bright daylight; the ridge cap seams lock together like a finely tailored suit, and every course tracks arrow-straight across the slope
imag_gen2.v2: Fresh architectural shingles rendered in a deep, even tone; the courses sit in military alignment, and the sun teases out subtle dimensional shadows
imag_gen2.v3: Close detail where ridge meets plane—flashing nestles under shingle edges, the line work immaculate; a sky so clear it feels polished
imag_gen2.v4: An expanse of new shingles with sculpted shadow lines that accentuate pattern and pitch; the roof breathes confidence and careful workmanship
imag_gen2.v5: A roofscape of disciplined geometry—straight lines, crisp valleys, and corners that land with precision—glowing in honest daylight

imag_gen3.v1: A standing seam metal roof gleams with linear perfection—long, uninterrupted seams march toward the horizon; the reflective finish captures sky and light like a modern sculpture
imag_gen3.v2: Vertical seams rise proudly from each panel, giving the roof a tailored cadence; a glossy modern finish adds a quiet, architectural drama
imag_gen3.v3: Low-angle perspective that rides along the crest of a metal roof; sunlight streaks softly, and the seam lines lead the eye in a confident glide
imag_gen3.v4: Sleek, contemporary metal roofing with concealed fasteners—nothing interrupts the language of clean lines and engineered calm
imag_gen3.v5: A clarity-driven portrait of long seam lines, crisp transitions, and a finish that reads both durable and design-forward

imag_gen4.v1: A newly finished composite shingle roof spreads in a calm, uniform tone; daylight reveals the subtle texturing that makes each course distinct yet harmonious
imag_gen4.v2: Premium composite shingles glow with a consistent hue and refined texture, sunlight coaxing gentle highlights from their sculpted surfaces
imag_gen4.v3: Close-up at the edge where tabs align like well-cut stones; micro shadows and crisp cuts speak to careful placement
imag_gen4.v4: A plane of composite shingles running in flawless rows under an open sky; the pattern anchors the home with quiet strength
imag_gen4.v5: Editorial angle that celebrates alignment, tone, and surface character across a pristine composite roof

imag_gen5.v1: Terracotta clay tiles burn with sun-warmed color, each barrel catching a soft highlight; neat rows curve like a terraced hillside, precise and timeless
imag_gen5.v2: Fresh Mediterranean clay tiles glow in a warm, earthy hue; strong light kisses the rounded profiles, carving graceful bands of light and shade
imag_gen5.v3: Close detail celebrates the rhythmic arches of barrel tiles—vivid pigment, clean mortar lines, and an artisan’s sense of order
imag_gen5.v4: A terracotta expanse crowned by clean ridges and carefully set caps; the blue sky drapes a classic palette over a classic material
imag_gen5.v5: Elegant clay tile installation with unwavering spacing and sculpted curves; bright daylight lifts the texture into high relief

imag_gen6.v1: An elegant field of grey slate tiles under a painterly overcast sky; crisp edges catch muted highlights, and the surface exudes refined permanence
imag_gen6.v2: Natural slate shingles with gentle color drift—charcoal, pewter, a whisper of blue; the finish is sophisticated, the light soft and forgiving
imag_gen6.v3: Close view where slate courses meet a run of copper flashing; the moody sky makes the metals glow like old coins
imag_gen6.v4: A new slate roof rendered in neat, unwavering alignment; texture rises and falls as clouds pass, a portrait of timeproof craft
imag_gen6.v5: Classic slate geometry: clean valleys, true ridges, and quiet tonal depth; diffused light wraps the scene in heritage calm

imag_gen1.v1: High-energy call-to-action backdrop layering vignettes of roofers mid-task—nail guns firing, ladders arcing skyward, shingles stacked like armor—arranged with a deliberate copy-safe right third, 16:9
imag_gen1.v2: A bold collage where motion lines and soft motion blur suggest speed and efficiency; scenes of measuring, cutting, and fastening converge in a design-conscious composition that leaves breathable space for buttons
imag_gen1.v3: Dynamic hero background intercutting roof edges, chalk snaps, and gloved hands; the montage wraps around a central negative space intended for a crisp CTA
imag_gen1.v4: Fast-paced mosaic of tools and teamwork—impact driver sparks, tape pulling true, shingle bundles shifting—woven into a cinematic band across the frame, 16:9
imag_gen1.v5: An energetic service collage dusted with brand tones; elements drift in subtle parallax while a calm gradient panel anchors call-to-action text, wide 16:9

imag_gen2.v1: Close, tactile portrait of a nail gun seating a shingle; the metal nose rings against mineral granules as the coil advances—a ballet of steel and stone under creamy bokeh
imag_gen2.v2: Macro detail at the nail gun tip poised over a textured shingle; tiny flecks catch highlights while the tool’s finish reflects a world of work
imag_gen2.v3: A steady hand guides the shingle to the line as the trigger pulls; in selective focus, sweat-darkened glove leather and precise placement tell a craftsman’s story
imag_gen2.v4: Tight composition where a compact stack of shingles leans beside a coil of nails; the tool rests like a trusted instrument at intermission
imag_gen2.v5: Ridge cap installation at arm’s length—clean overlaps, a quick burst of the gun, background dissolving into a gentle blur that centers the craft

imag_gen3.v1: A sunlit aerial of suburbia where rooftops tessellate into a satisfying pattern; intersections and cul-de-sacs become the punctuation in a clean, modern layout, 16:9
imag_gen3.v2: Top-down grid where roofs and streets form a lucid schematic; midday clarity erases haze, revealing texture and order at neighborhood scale
imag_gen3.v3: Drone panorama that celebrates roof geometry—rakes, ridges, and valleys tracing calligraphic lines beneath a flawless sky
imag_gen3.v4: High-altitude perspective with uniform roof patterns breathing under crisp midday light; the scene reads like an architectural blueprint in motion
imag_gen3.v5: Overhead emphasis on repeating shingle textures and rhythmic pitches, the wide frame balancing density with calm, 16:9

imag_gen4.v1: A commercial rooftop vista leads the eye to a moody city skyline; dusk hues settle over a field of equipment and membrane seams, professional and cinematic
imag_gen4.v2: Blue hour settles like velvet as an expansive flat roof reflects a subtle urban glow; parapets and vents sketch an industrial horizon
imag_gen4.v3: Evening tones drape an urban skyline perched above ordered rows of rooftop units; the composition balances function and grandeur
imag_gen4.v4: Wide twilight frame where parapet edges and utility boxes create a rhythm; beyond, the city lights bead into a necklace of promise
imag_gen4.v5: Industrial leading lines etched into the roof skin carry the gaze toward towers; dramatic dusk color grades the scene with quiet resolve

imag_gen5.v1: A warmly lit workbench vignette where a roofing square and chalk line rest with intention; nails glint softly beside a faithful knife—orderly, inviting, and human
imag_gen5.v2: Organized tools arrayed with geometric satisfaction: square at true 90, chalk line spooled just so, fasteners nested like punctuation
imag_gen5.v3: Pegboard tableau with branded tools hung in tidy cadence; the warmth of the room suggests long, focused hours of craft
imag_gen5.v4: Close detail of a measured cut—knife kissing the guideline over a shingle, the square holding steady; an intimate moment of precision
imag_gen5.v5: Workbench still life with gloves, eye protection, and tuned tools at rest; cozy light wraps the scene in readiness

imag_gen6.v1: Lifestyle portrait of a smiling homeowner framed by a freshly roofed house; soft evening light warms the siding and lends a welcoming glow
imag_gen6.v2: A happy couple stands in their front yard, eyes tipping up to admire the new roof; the garden hums with life in gentle, flattering light
imag_gen6.v3: From the porch, a family waves with bright, open smiles beneath a crisp roofline; the image feels like a postcard from a job well done
imag_gen6.v4: Close portrait of a homeowner’s thumbs-up, the home softly blurred behind; bokeh lights sparkle like a quiet celebration
imag_gen6.v5: A satisfied client stands beside a contractor mid-handshake, warm tones wrapping a scene of trust and completion

Map.markerIconPrompt: Minimal vector roofing company logo pin icon, flat design, white on dark, SVG, high contrast
Map.statsBackgroundImagePrompt: Subtle blurred roofing texture background suitable behind statistics, neutral tones, low contrast, wide 16:9

imag_gen1.v1: A subdued, blurred background that breathes cool, neutral tones—just a hint of roofing texture drifting beneath the surface—crafted to let statistics float in crisp relief, 16:9
imag_gen1.v2: Featherweight abstract with the faintest whisper of shingle pattern; the contrast is dialed low so charts and labels read effortlessly
imag_gen1.v3: Soft slate gradient blooming into generous negative space; any texture is a suggestion, ensuring numbers and icons remain the headliners, wide 16:9
imag_gen1.v4: Neutral grey-blue haze with a velvety blur, tuned for unobtrusiveness; a perfect canvas for maps, badges, and service hours
imag_gen1.v5: Feathered gradient where an echo of rooflines barely grazes the eye; UI-friendly by design, sophisticated by restraint

imag_gen2.v1: Minimal vector geopin rendered as a crisp white mark atop a dark circle—its negative space carves a clean roof outline; balanced strokes, pure SVG aesthetic
imag_gen2.v2: Monochrome map pin that cleverly merges a classic location marker with a house roof silhouette; friendly proportions, immediate legibility
imag_gen2.v3: Simple badge variant with a roofline graphic nested inside a pin; thick, confident strokes designed to scale without fuss
imag_gen2.v4: Outlined geopin whose inner contour hints at shingle motif; high-contrast and perfectly suited for small UI placements
imag_gen2.v5: A refined pin icon integrating a roof peak at its heart; symmetrical, modern, and brandable in a heartbeat

imag_gen1.v1: A sun-bright hero frame of a residential home flaunting a pristine asphalt shingle roof; blue sky blooms overhead while lush greenery frames the facade—curb appeal distilled, 16:9
imag_gen1.v2: A modern suburban residence showcases brand-new architectural shingles; crisp shadow lines sculpt the roof planes as the home sits confidently in the landscape
imag_gen1.v3: Two-story home under a rich, dark shingle roof; the lawn manicured to a velvety green, windows sparkling—an image of care and completion
imag_gen1.v4: Curb-appeal portrait where roof lines and dormers take the spotlight; the composition guides the eye up the gables into a radiant sky
imag_gen1.v5: Front elevation study revealing a new roof and trim-perfect gutters; editorial poise with a welcoming, lived-in warmth, 16:9

imag_gen2.v1: Commercial warehouse crowned with a flawless white TPO membrane; skylights punctuate the surface as the horizon stretches clean and confident, 16:9
imag_gen2.v2: A large industrial rooftop traces neat TPO seams around vents and curbs; beyond, a city backdrop nods to the scale and reliability of the installation
imag_gen2.v3: Distribution center roof articulated by skylight rhythm over a spotless white membrane; the wide frame celebrates order and function
imag_gen2.v4: Aerial perspective where a reflective roof plane catches sky tones; meticulous detailing reads from the air as an assurance of quality, 16:9
imag_gen2.v5: Warehouse complex with a freshly laid membrane, the clouds minimal and the lines tidy; the composition suggests longevity and peace of mind

imag_gen3.v1: A crisp overlay concept: flat, modern roofing symbols (repair wrench, installation hammer, inspection magnifier) arranged to complement photography without clutter
imag_gen3.v2: Compact icon set in a unified visual language—repair, install, inspect—balanced line weights and generous padding for flawless overlay use
imag_gen3.v3: Minimal iconography suite where each mark breathes; consistent stroke widths ensure legibility at small sizes
imag_gen3.v4: Modern glyphs representing residential and commercial roofing services; a restrained palette and rounded corners feel friendly yet professional
imag_gen3.v5: Clean vector service badges, monochrome by design for maximum adaptability; ideal for quick visual cues over imagery

googleReviews.name: Valjean Whitlow
googleReviews.text: Excellent workmanship and fair pricing! They handled everything with the insurance company, showed up when they said they would and cleaned up after they were done. They even replaced shingles on my porch and replaced one of my gutters, despite these things not being covered by insurance payment. I highly recommend them!

googleReviews.name: Gloria Mitchum
googleReviews.text: Mr Craft and his crew did a wonderful job replacing my roof. All of my questions were answered. Thank you so much & God bless

googleReviews.name: ral K
googleReviews.text: Carl Craft and his company provided excellent, reliable, and quick service..he worked with insurance company, so our part was minimal. I would recommend him to anyone who is need of any type of roofing issues.

googleReviews.name: MELODY WILLIAMS
googleReviews.text: Today I had a wonderful Roof inspection and minor repairs with Craft Roofing.  The Inspector was very knowledgeable about my roof and very informative.  I give the company a 5-star rating.

googleReviews.name: Dan Kile
googleReviews.text: Carl was excellent to work with. His crew was in and out quickly and cleaned up their mess.   I would highly recommend Craft Roofing.

googleReviews.name: David Snyder
googleReviews.text: I would like to share a review of my experience with Craft Roofing Company. I had my roof replaced by them, and the results were outstanding. The installers were on time and finished the job in a little more than one day. The roof looks …

imag_gen1.v1: Google reviews badge reinterpreted with brand-correct colors and flat simplicity; a transparent background ensures it floats cleanly over any layout
imag_gen1.v2: A refined star-rating badge designed for testimonials—crisp vector stars and balanced typography—brand-safe and immediately legible
imag_gen1.v3: Minimal row of five stars proportioned for elegance; clean geometry and even spacing radiate trust at a glance
imag_gen1.v4: A sleek review ribbon punctuated with stars; the flat, fuss-free design nestles neatly into headers and CTAs
imag_gen1.v5: Compact review crest with clear star symbology and a high-contrast silhouette; tailor-made for small UI hotspots

imag_gen2.v1: A soft, abstract testimonial canvas—light gradients drift like mist across 16:9—designed to make quoted text glow with clarity
imag_gen2.v2: Gentle pastel gradient backdrop where barely-there shapes suggest warmth and approachability; contrast remains deliberately restrained
imag_gen2.v3: Cream-to-slate gradient kissed by faint organic blobs; typography sits forward while the background whispers support
imag_gen2.v4: Feathered, bokeh-adjacent field in muted hues; the wide 16:9 frame feels airy and elegant behind testimonials
imag_gen2.v5: An airy abstract with soft waveforms dilating across the frame; unobtrusive by nature, uplifting in effect

imag_gen1.v1: A modern booking backdrop where a refined gradient flows behind a barely-there roofline; the right third remains pristine and copy-safe for form fields, 16:9
imag_gen1.v2: Clean diagonal gradient that subtly echoes a roof pitch; generous whitespace ensures inputs and labels breathe with clarity
imag_gen1.v3: Soft dual-tone gradient whispering around a watermark roof outline; wide composition naturally frames a centered booking panel
imag_gen1.v4: Cool blue gradient flecked with the faintest shingle texture; UI-friendly contrast balances calm with legibility, 16:9
imag_gen1.v5: A warm-to-cool gradient transition that hints at a roof peak on the horizon; copy-safe zones are thoughtfully shaped for forms

imag_gen2.v1: A clean, monochrome roofline logo distilled to its essential geometry; vector-sharp, high-contrast, and ready to sit atop a booking card
imag_gen2.v2: Minimal logo mark—solid black or white—formed by a single decisive roofline; scales beautifully from favicon to hero
imag_gen2.v3: Geometric peak drawn in one continuous stroke; flat monochrome treatment keeps it timeless and adaptable
imag_gen2.v4: Stylized house emblem with bold strokes and perfect symmetry; SVG artistry that reads instantly at a glance
imag_gen2.v5: Modern silhouette of a roof, centered and balanced; the logo feels confident without shouting

imag_gen3.v1: Warm-toned lifestyle scene of a happy customer making a call for a roofing quote; golden light skims the room, lending the moment an easy optimism
imag_gen3.v2: A homeowner by a sunlit window, smiling mid-conversation; soft highlights trace the phone and fingertips as greenery blurs outside
imag_gen3.v3: Cozy interior moment: a person scheduling a roof inspection on a smartphone; the glow of the screen pools gently over relaxed hands
imag_gen3.v4: On the porch, a casual call unfolds with the home and crisp roofline composing the background; natural light flatters and reassures
imag_gen3.v5: A friendly client speaks with a contractor on speakerphone, warm bokeh and soft shadows wrapping the frame in calm

imag_gen1.v1: Studio portrait of the roofing company owner in a branded shirt and hard hat; catchlights sparkle in the eyes as controlled light sculpts a confident, approachable expression—ready for transparent PNG use
imag_gen1.v2: Professional headshot of a contractor in logoed attire and helmet; the background is clean and soft, emphasizing a trustworthy, service-forward presence
imag_gen1.v3: Waist-up portrait with arms folded in quiet confidence; a neutral backdrop and precise lighting define clear edges for flawless compositing
imag_gen1.v4: Owner holding a rolled blueprint—subtle studio gradient behind; the pose communicates leadership, planning, and pride
imag_gen1.v5: Friendly, on-brand portrait in hi-vis vest and hard hat; isolation-ready with crisp outlines and a warm, welcoming demeanor

imag_gen2.v1: Portrait of a roofing project manager with clipboard and hard hat; neutral background and tidy lighting produce a transparent-PNG-friendly edge
imag_gen2.v2: Smart-casual manager headshot, clipboard tucked under arm; clean studio light and even tones convey calm competence
imag_gen2.v3: Project lead with safety helmet and documents in hand; neutral background and careful key light underscore attention to detail
imag_gen2.v4: Site manager in a branded polo holding a tablet—studio setting that balances approachability with authority
imag_gen2.v5: Foreman’s professional portrait with a checklist; isolated background for easy placement in team sections

imag_gen3.v1: Bright outdoor team portrait—roofing crew in matching uniforms, tools at their sides, sunlight giving everything a crisp, honest clarity
imag_gen3.v2: Group shot staged on the driveway: branded pickup and ladders form the backdrop while the crew stands shoulder to shoulder, ready to work
imag_gen3.v3: Lineup of crew members in branded shirts and hard hats; a sunny day and easy smiles help customers feel they’re in good hands
imag_gen3.v4: Team posed with a curated selection of tools and materials; the framing reads friendly, organized, and thoroughly professional
imag_gen3.v5: Candid moment grabbed during a break—natural smiles, relaxed posture, and daylight that makes the scene feel real and relatable
